name: Laser 100 Beams Funny Joke
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Laser.
100 Laser Beams Funny Joke - this is a game simulation of a joke application where you can play on your phone like a laser. Love the beautiful laser? You small one beam and you want more of them? For realism used camera!
Then use our secure laser pointer! With this laser simulator you can play and be sure not to anyone not harm!
Make fun and play your friends and loved ones!
Warning game joke created for pranks and practical jokes and is absolutely safe for your health!
Thank you for playing our apps! Leave us feedback and we will try to make them even better for you!
